website_summaries.verdict: For those who prefer crunchy over chewy, yet still want a diet-friendly option, this bar fits the bill well.
pros: Great, nutty crunch with minimal chewiness
Dark chocolate nibs stand out in this bar
cons: Somewhat crumbly, and the chia seeds can be hard on dental work

customer_reviews.title: EDIT!  (wonderful snack bar, be careful, messy)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Just a touch of chocolate, binding the nuts and seeds. The bars shatter, be careful opening the wrapper. Sugar is reasonable. Just perfect. Edited 3/8/19..... if you "subscribe and save" for this product, watch the per unit cost! My original order cost about $16 for a box of 15, and subsequent subscribe and save orders orders were filled in the neighborhood of $20/box. The latest renewal of my subscribe and save order was placed for me at $27/box!! That's an increase from $16 to $27 in a matter of months, and I canceled my standing order. Price gouging.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Chewy, not dry and crunchy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great snack bar for anyone try to go grain and gluten free. It says it is "crunchy", but the honey in it actually makes it more like a firm chewy experience, not dry and crunchy. That is one of the reasons I like this bar.
customer_reviews.author: Broomfield, CO

customer_reviews.title: They are good, but not that good
customer_reviews.text: I was the fool for this transaction! I misread the ad and thought I was getting 2 boxes for $16.99! This makes each bar $4.24 a piece! They are good, but not that good!! Never, would I pay that much intentionally for this product.
customer_reviews.author: JCL

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but only 4 month expiration date
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor of the Maple Cinnamon bars! Also it seemed to be lower in sugar than their othersbars but still pleasantly sweet. I was disappointed though to buy a box of 15 bars with only 4 months until expiration. The company's website says they have a 9 month shelf life, which I would've appreciated because I want to add these to our "Go Bags." The company can't sell direct to customers & my local Whole Foods didn't carry the Maple Cinnamon variety. Oh well. I took a chance & thought I'd pass along what I thought...
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Stale! Hard as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: These expire in 2 weeks and they’re stale. They’re hard as a rock. I had them send me a replacement hoping they would rectify the situation. They sent me a box with the same expiration date and they’re also hard as a rock! These bars are the best when they’re fresh! They’re chewy and delicious. These are not! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: These bars are a nice change-up from the normal date-based Larabars
customer_reviews.text: These bars are a nice change-up from the normal date-based Larabars. This is a yummy flavor and I like that they aren't as sugary. However, they really do like to fall apart when you eat them and if I am driving while I eat one (which is usually the case) it's impossible not to make a mess. Nevertheless, I'll probably buy another "Nut-and-Seed" variety Larabar in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Chris Harrison Boeh

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful, but where are they now!!!???
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely delicious and better than the much sweeter fruit and nut bars. But it appears that the company isn't making them anymore! Too bad, I much prefer the Nut and Seed bars to the other types. And I buy them in the large boxes!
customer_reviews.author: Judi Easley for Blue Cat Review

customer_reviews.title: My favorite granola bar!
customer_reviews.text: This flavor has a hint of tartness (I assume due to the cranberry). I love Larabar’s Nut & Seed bars! These much more resemble a Nature Valley-type granola bar than a chewy bar, like the original Larabars were. Made with paleo ingredients = a plus! 😄
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: What a waste! Don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: Super hard and brittle, you take one bite and the bar explodes all over the place. It's impossible to eat one without half of it ending up on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: These are too delicious!
customer_reviews.text: If I had a complaint about these bars, it would be that I want to eat the whole box in one sitting. If you need to exercise your self-control, eat one of these and place the rest of the box in sight. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bars
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it, not too sweet and not too hard. It still kind of stuck to my teeth when I am eating it. It’s better to have this bar instead of cookies when your sweet craving comes.
customer_reviews.author: Hen Hen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bar so far
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bar so far. These have just the right amount of crunch and softness. They are not too sweet and a great in the go snack or meal.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Freeman

customer_reviews.title: cruchy nut and seed bar is no good
customer_reviews.text: I really like larabar bars; the cruchy nut and seed bar though is not really crunchy but very hard to chew and everything sticks to you teeth. The taste is not as good either. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Shirin

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars!
customer_reviews.text: These things are natures perfect food. I could live off of these stupid things! All flavors of these nut & seed Larabars are Devine & I only wish I could find them in my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L. Crist

customer_reviews.title: I’ve purchased lots of flavors of Larabars and loved them. This in not one of them
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased lots of flavors of Larabars and loved them. This in not one of them. These are dry, hard and weirdly sticky. The flavor is good but the overall eating experience is so unpleasant that I will be deleting them from my Subscribe and Save list. Too bad...
customer_reviews.author: linda galella

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: These are healthy with really good ingredients and wonderful flavor and for me they are about the best bar I have had in a very long time so I hope they don’t start making them as so many good bars in the past have come and gone .
customer_reviews.author: Nina Fogelman

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive - 4 bars for a huge price- never again ...
customer_reviews.text: Deceptive - 4 bars for a huge price- never again.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: He loves these bars because they are healthy for him and they taste good too. I will definitely be buying them again
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who eats gluten and dairy free because of some allergies. He loves these bars because they are healthy for him and they taste good too. I will definitely be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: The Studious One

customer_reviews.title: Nice change from the other Larabar flavors
customer_reviews.text: Nice change from the other Larabar flavors. It is not soft like most Larabars. It has a nice crunch to it. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I was expecting something different, since this flavor in regular Larabar is so good. Didn't like these, and I'm the person that gets the weirdest kinds of bread at the grocery store. They're just not pleasant to eat. Lacking in flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Skip breakfast with these
customer_reviews.text: Yummy and filling--helped me lose weight so I didn't feel hungry but perfect for snack as well.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Gaw

customer_reviews.title: YAY! Crunchy LaraBars!
customer_reviews.text: Just received our first box of these in the Crunchy Nut & Seed Gluten Free Bar, Dark Chocolate Almond flavor and YAY! we opened them right away to try them. Really yummy. Crunchy & dark chocolatey. Sweet but not too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: TZ2DSR

customer_reviews.title: Healthy options
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars! My diet is restricted to non-dairy, no grains, so these bars are a godsend. The pricing on Amazon beats what I paid in the grocery stores, so it is on my Subscribe and Save list! Thank you Amazon for gicing me healthy options.
customer_reviews.author: JSkimin

customer_reviews.title: Fewer carbs than most
customer_reviews.text: I’m on a Keto diet and these have only 13 carbs, less than most snack type bars. I like that they are a crunchy yet slightly chewy texture and have a bit of chocolate to satisfy my sweet craving at 3:00 each afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: babetsba

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love these. They tasted great and have a good whole nut texture. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: These are an amazing snack. And the ingredient list is awesome-- nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: These are an amazing snack. And the ingredient list is awesome-- nothing so terrible that you need to feel guilty about eating later. Very tasty! Not as crunchy as I thought they'd been, but not a soft bar either.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Skube

customer_reviews.title: but they still seem like they are all dried out
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these bars before at a store and experienced them to be softer, less crunchy. When I received these from Amazon, they seemed almost stale and with not as much flavor as the other ones I purchased. The expiration date isn’t until later next month, but they still seem like they are all dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Wishard

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & Not Expires
customer_reviews.text: These bars were a great value for the protein and fiber content. They were also fresh as could be...they don't expire for 6 months. That is a most realistic timeline for an online nutrition bar purchase. Delicious flavor and the texture isn't too chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Storwolly

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly not cardboard.
customer_reviews.text: This bar and another type I ordered, are really not too bad. But they just can't compete with the chemical bombs, and other nasties that are in the standard on shelf bars.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Perfect when I'm hangry at work and would otherwise be tempted to grab something unhealthy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Product stale and Expired
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in bulk to have on hand for awhile. It came outdated and rancid to eat. I am not the type to be bothered with returns. It is just a disappointing financial loss for me. Lesson learned will never buy items like this again from Amazon. Big ripoff
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I found these in my Kroger once, then they stopped selling them, so now I buy them from Amazon. Very nice natural healthy chocolate fix.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Brown

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Expiration Date is less than a month away
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today and very unhappy to see that they expire in less than a month. I usually eat one a week so they will probably go stale before I can finish them. Not sure why a food item like this would not have an expiration date further out or seller give a discount if near expiration. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: MDLaxer85

customer_reviews.title: Tasty! Now unaffordable!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting. Great product. Bought my first box to try for 19.98 or so, just under 20 dollars. Now they are 10 dollars more? a month or 2 later! You can be sure I wont buy anymore! Later Larabar!
customer_reviews.author: Thad L. Inscho

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try these because they're different from regular Larabars. No dates. Almonds, Honey, Sprouted Chia Seeds, Cacao Nibs, Unsweetened Coconut, Maple Sugar, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Powder, Sea Salt.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Dream

customer_reviews.title: Wow, amazing taste!
customer_reviews.text: These are really tasty and not a ton of sugars/carbs. Highly recommended though a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P.

customer_reviews.title: These bars arrived open and they are super hard as some other customers said
customer_reviews.text: These bars arrived open and they are super hard as some other customers said. I haven’t tasted them and I am afraid to. The bars themselves are in plastic which is unopened. I will be back to review them after I taste one.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order unless you know expiration date!
customer_reviews.text: Received product today 9/9/19. A case of larabar nut and seed bars. The expiration date on bars is 10/6. This is not ok. Cannot use by then. Would have never ordered if knew there would be a 3 week expiration date from when received. Now states order cannot be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: If you like a nutty crunchy type texture then these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Yummy bars
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. Great flavor but only downside is they are pricy
customer_reviews.author: Homer Lawless

customer_reviews.title: YUM! New favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo yummy! I'm going to need many more boxes! Boxes for me, boxes for my mom & my friends! A little Protien, a little sweet, a lot nutty & delicious! Perfect morning or afternoon snack.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Low carb and taste great since it is mostly nuts and some dried fruit. Decent source of protein with low carbs. Bought the box when they were on sale. Glad I did
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: No too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I love Larabars and was excited to see the crunchy ones. The best is that they are not sicky sweet, but the flavor is a little like cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Hunny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting, simple ingredients, and not too much sugar or carbs. Perfect for breakfast or a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: If you like 'em, they're really good :-)  We do!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the taste and textures of this great portable food bar. It's nice to have a special snack for trips or afternoons away from home that is also perfect for our particular food sensitivities.
customer_reviews.author: Just Bob

customer_reviews.title: Best snack bar!
customer_reviews.text: These are better than the original Larabar! Only 13 gm. of carbs! So satis and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: JBC

customer_reviews.title: Okay bars
customer_reviews.text: They were very weird tasting. Not sure if i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: No crunch for us, sorry
customer_reviews.text: Guess we’re just not into gluten free. Bland taste and texture
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars, they are crunchy and tasty. Light on the stomach too. Good for a light snack. These particular Larabars are hard to find in the stores. So glad I can get them through Amazon. Will buy them often.
customer_reviews.author: linda abreu

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: What a great twist for Larabar! Crunchy! My family love these!
customer_reviews.author: paula clark

customer_reviews.title: Mine came expired as of July (in September.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine came expired as of July (in September...). Be sure to check the dates. They are pricey (but yummy). Only dinging because they should not be sold after their expiry date.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! I love the taste and crunch of the chia seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Turner

customer_reviews.title: Bland & Small
customer_reviews.text: These are very bland. They are also very small...at just over 1 oz. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Danimal

customer_reviews.title: Sweet snack sweetened with maple and honey
customer_reviews.text: The product is fantastic. It fills you up and is only sweetened with maple syrup and honey. Very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Geologist lady

customer_reviews.title: Contains coconut, not crunchy
customer_reviews.text: These were advertised as containing 7 ingredients, but they now contain 8, including coconut. Not good if you don't like coconut. They were also advertised as "crunchy" but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: Best "granola" bar ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best "granola" bar ever. Crunchy and chewy at same time. Not too sweet. At 13 grms carbs the perfect snack for type 2 diabetic or any normal person.
customer_reviews.author: Quick k

customer_reviews.title: Low carb; great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for diabetics, due to the low net carbs--about 9.They're all natural with nothing artificial.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ... she developed a sugar allergy this has been a great addition to her diet
customer_reviews.text: After my wife contacted Lyme she developed a sugar allergy this has been a great addition to her diet.
customer_reviews.author: Old harbor western way

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how much I like these. Quite a tasty snack to throw in the bag and keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars! Nutty and seedy without being hard to chew
customer_reviews.author: Callie Simons

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! My new favorite! Filling size, crunchy, yum! Definitely a good dark Chocolate, nutty afternoon pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Nut and Seed bars
customer_reviews.text: These bars are the BEST! Too bad the company has stopped production.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Larabar already. This certainly did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Crumbly mess
customer_reviews.text: Not our favorite. Crumbly and dry. Flavor is good, but the texture ruins it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bit of chocolate without being horrible for you
customer_reviews.text: yummy! Nice little bit of chocolate without being horrible for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Skube

customer_reviews.title: you can even chop them up and use like granola with yogurt and fruit
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious, you can even chop them up and use like granola with yogurt and fruit.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: ate about three bites only
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that it was so so dry and was just no taste what so ever.... donated the rest of the box
customer_reviews.author: Turtle Carey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very tasty, great flavor, and I like the texture and the crunch. I have re-ordered multiple times!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: very delicious!
customer_reviews.text: very delicious! and makes a great snack while I'm at work.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ennis

customer_reviews.title: My discontinued favorite!
customer_reviews.text: These are discontinued. They changed the recipe and made them smaller. I loved these, my favorites!! Oh, well.
customer_reviews.author: S.Poye

customer_reviews.title: Must be old inventory or poor storage....very stale
customer_reviews.text: These are nowhere near as fresh as when I buy them at the local grocery store. Sorry I bought them. This isn't really a hit on the product, just on the seller....they're stale.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Herndon

customer_reviews.title: but quite good overall. I'm pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: I little tough to chew, but quite good overall. I'm pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: taste great bars
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! These are very crunchy and tasty bars. I like the different flavors in the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the product but the first box I received was a month from being expired.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not to sweet they are chewy and great with a cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfying!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and low in sugar. Satisfies sweet and crunch. A bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: emykane

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Never received a stale batch. Quality was as expected and they taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Ohhh these are delicious! i've got them on subscption ...
customer_reviews.text: Ohhh these are delicious! i've got them on subscption delivery.
customer_reviews.author: raggs

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: This 1 star is for the expired box I just received but this is my favor gluten free bar.
customer_reviews.author: Romanda Brown

customer_reviews.title: I don't care for these they have too many Chia seeds. And they're kind of dry. My husband thinks they're OK.
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for these they have too many Chia seeds. And they're kind of dry. My husband thinks they're OK.
customer_reviews.author: L. Little

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills crunchy cravings!!
customer_reviews.text: Like these bars way better than their other Lara bars. If you like crunchy, get these!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Price goes up 12.00 for a 15ct box in a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Like the taste ,but am done with this product. Price went from 21.00 t0 33.00 in a couple of months for the 15 ct box. No thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tim Norrick

customer_reviews.title: Larabar is good
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard. I have all my teeth, and these were hard to chew.Flavor good though.
customer_reviews.author: G.A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for imperfect teeth
customer_reviews.text: The taste is great. I's to hard for my partials. My co-workers is enjoying them though!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, but very stale shipment!!
customer_reviews.text: While I liked the product taste, the last shipment I received was VERY stale. Cancelled my subscription because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Good taste. Not a lot of ingredients/additives
customer_reviews.text: I eat these for breakfast or snack. Good taste. Not a lot of ingredients/additives.
customer_reviews.author: nick z

customer_reviews.title: Lara bar Nut & Seed bars are incredible!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste and the ingredients! The price point was very reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Carter

customer_reviews.title: It tastes like banana cake with chocolate and chia seeds
customer_reviews.text: Had other larabars before; this one is ok but flavors are bland. It tastes like banana cake with chocolate and chia seeds
customer_reviews.author: Yarymar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bars are not at all crunchy. They are stale and very soft. How can I return it?
customer_reviews.author: Avin

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: 4 of the bars I received were not properly sealed, and were moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn D. Paige

customer_reviews.title: but good. Could reproduce it with a food processor
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. A bit crumbly, but good. Could reproduce it with a food processor, the nuts, and some honey, but you pay for the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chia seeds
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bar but the chia seeds were hard to clean the teeth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bars are a life saver and absolutely delicious !!
customer_reviews.author: Janam Thakkar

product_meta.title: Larabar Crunchy Nut & Seed Gluten Free Bar, Dark Chocolate Almond, 1.24 oz Bars (15 Count)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Dark Chocolate Almond| Size:15 CountAt Larabar, we delight in creating super delicious flavors from just a few carefully chosen ingredients. Our Crunchy Nut & Seed bar is made for those craving that extra Crunch while still remaining gluten free. Even better, we've added Sprouted chia seeds to give you an extra boost to get you through your day. It's the ultimate in Simple. Pure. Delicious. Enjoy the energy! Lara, Creator of Larabar
feature_bullets: NEW CRUNCHY TEXTURE: Your favorite real & simple bar, now with a new crunchy texture
SIMPLE INGREDIENTS: Gluten-free & non-GMO crunchy snack bars made with almonds and sprouted chia seeds
WHOLESOME SNACK: Only 9 ingredients. Made from a simple blend of almonds, honey, sprouted chia seeds, cacao nibs, unsweetened coconut, maple sugar, coconut oil, cocoa powder, and sea salt
REAL FLAVORS: Three delicious flavors: Dark Chocolate Almond, Honey Almond Cranberry, and Maple Cinnamon
CONVENIENCE: Wholesome snack bar, perfect for an on-the go breakfast and your busy, active lifestyle

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
